backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two image-path correction tasks and their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files, describing their roles in asset validation, UI overlays, scene components, hooks, utilities, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and base layout styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application flow controlling asset validation screens and rendering the theatre scene with controls once assets are verified.
frontend/src/components/AssetScanResults: Overlay listing validated assets with optional refresh/resync actions and a Continue button.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundSilhou: Displays a large, low-opacity background silhouette image centered behind all scene elements.
Centered hub logo with a faint halo and a forced unmount/remount cycle for asset rebinding.
frontend/src/components/MissingAssetOver: Blocking overlay showing a missing-asset error with optional refresh and resync actions.
frontend/src/components/PreviewSyncContr: Floating popover menu providing refresh, resync, and slug‑validated publish actions.
frontend/src/components/TheatreStageScen: Renders an immersive theatre stage scene with curtains, seating, and visual gradients using absolute‑positioned divs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for future React Query hooks with no current functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequiredAssets.ts: Checks required image assets for availability and validity, reporting missing files and supporting refresh.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode rules, and base page layout styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/publishSlug.ts: Validates and sanitizes publish slugs, generating defaults and enforcing character and length constraints.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme variables, colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Holds current STEP 1 project state, including strict asset-binding rules, required filenames, validation behavior, and cinema‑stage visual requirements. Also records existing features, architectural notes, and known issues such as an invalid build-domain name.
